item.title: Brooke Schofield EXPOSES Matt Rife, The Weeknd & Rachel Zegler DM Trisha... | Just Trish
item.description: Podcast Description On episode 38 of ‘JUST TRISH’, Trisha shares her most EXCITING news ever… The Weeknd reached out to her. Will ‘The Idol’ star be a guest on the podcast? Plus, Rachel Zegler calls Trish out after her controversial Zach Sang interview. Plus, we have the EXCLUSIVE tea from Brooke Schofield after she EXPOSED ex-boyfriend Matt Rife on ‘CANCELLED’! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: Gigi Gorgeous on Becoming a Mom & EXPOSING Trisha's Crush on Shane Dawson | Just Trish
item.description: Podcast Description The nostalgia is real as Gigi Gorgeous joins Trish to reminisce on their most iconic moments over the years! Plus, Gigi drops a SHOCKING career bombshell, and details her tumultuous IVF journey as she prepares to enter her mommy era. And the blonde bombshell also exposes the awkward moment when Trisha confessed her crush on Shane Dawson! Plus, what went wrong when Meghan Trainor joined Tana Mongeau and Brooke Schofield on ‘Cancelled’? Are the rumors about Brooke and Matt Rife true? item.description: Podcast Description On episode 35 of ‘JUST TRISH’, skinny legend and TikTok superstar Daus Mendoza gives Trisha a lesson on Spanish and gay slang. Plus, Daus spills secrets about what it was like working at McDonald’s before making it big on social media. And he dishes about the friendships and frenemies he’s made in the beauty influencer community. item.title: Forgiving Shane & Ryland, Matt Rife Is a MENACE & Exposing the David Dobrik Documentary | Just Trish
item.description: Podcast Description Trisha’s got a bun in the oven, and tea on the stove–she’s back with her hottest topics EVER. With Shane Dawson and Ryland Adams moving back in town ahead of the birth of their twins, would Trish consider making up with her former besties? And Casey Neistat teases his EXPLOSIVE Vlog Squad documentary that has David Dobrik shook. Plus, Trisha reacts to alleged “comedian” Matt Rife’s cringey Netflix standup special.

item.title: Trisha is PREGNANT With Baby Elvis! | Just Trish
item.description: Podcast Description Surprise! Trisha and Moses are expecting baby number 2! That’s right, Malibu Barbie is officially a big sister as the Paytas-Hacmon family gets ready to welcome baby Elvis. How long has Trish been keeping her pregnancy a secret? Plus, the ‘JUST TRISH’ crew reacts to Colleen Ballinger’s MESSY return to YouTube for one FINAL segment on the disgraced creator–as well as new details emerging from James Charles’ creepy past.

item.title: Shawty Bae Talks Getting a BBL, Her Friend With Benefits & Being BANNED From Malls | Just Trish
item.description: Podcast Description It’s a meme queen crossover event as Trisha sits down with the illustrious @shawtybaeofficial on episode 31 of ‘JUST TRISH’! Shawty Bae spills ALL the tea–from her aspirations on getting a BBL to her current “friends with benefits” relationship status with her roommate. Plus, Shawty Bae reveals her WILDEST meet & greet moments where she nearly got trampled and got a drink thrown in her face! Subscribe to the Podcast:

item.title: Rosanna Pansino CALLS OUT Colleen Ballinger, the TRUTH About MatPat & EXPOSING Bears | Just Trish
item.description: Podcast Description The vibes are IMMACULATE and the tea is HOT on episode 31 of ‘JUST TRISH’! Trisha reacts to Rosanna Pansino’s statement on her past friendship with Colleen Ballinger. Why did it take so long for Ro to take a stand? Plus, the TRUTH about YouTube’s golden boys, MatPat and Markiplier. And Trisha drops a conspiracy theory about BEARS that will leave the Internet reeling. Oh yeah, and Trisha is going to next year’s Met Gala!

item.title: Riley Reid On RETIRING From Adult Films, Being A Modern Mom & Befriending Logan Paul | Just Trish
item.description: Podcast Description On episode 30 of ‘JUST TRISH’, Trisha sits down with iconic adult entertainer Riley Reid to discuss the ups and downs of being a porn star–from WILD fan encounters to collaborating with David Dobrik and Logan Paul. Plus, Riley reveals what it’s like raising a daughter in the spotlight, and why she made the decision to NEVER show her child’s face on social media again. And the two bombshells talk through their past OF collaboration… and how much money they made from it!

item.title: Charli CALLS OUT Trish, James Charles Is DUBIOUS and A Shane & Friends REUNION? | Just Trish
item.description: Podcast Description Trish is back and causing a RUCKUS with more hot topics! Charli D’amelio seemingly calls out Trisha over their past feud. Is there still bad blood between the two TikTok legends? Plus, James Charles is caught being DUBIOUS after admitting to lying about a past makeup collab. And is there any hope for a “Shane & Friends” reunion? Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: Brooke Schofield On Her Toxic Ex, Feuding With Tana & the Future of CANCELLED | Just Trish
item.description: Podcast Description Trisha sits down with ‘CANCELLED’ host Brooke Schofield to discuss her meteoric rise to social media fame. Brooke tells all: From new details about her toxic ex, to feud rumors between her and Tana Mongeau. What is the future like for the ‘CANCELLED" podcast and tour? Plus, Brooke and Trish bond over the hardships of living with BPD, and how they continue to live with their mental illness. Subscribe to the Podcast:

item.title: Cops Are Called On Eugenia Cooney & the MrBeast Drama Gets Even Worse... | Just Trish
item.description: Podcast Description Trick or Trish! It’s a spooky Halloween edition of ‘JUST TRISH’—and Trisha is back to spill the tea on all the kooky and creepy drama. A new report reveals the cops have been called on Eugenia Cooley after fans continue to grow concerned for the YouTube star. Plus, Trish reveals what REALLY went down as Rosanna Pansino exposed MrBeast in our exclusive interview. Plus, a horrifying run-in with the Vlog Squad!

item.title: Rosanna Pansino Reveals She Was BETRAYED by MrBeast & Reality TV Producers | Just Trish
item.description: Podcast Description On episode 26 of ‘JUST TRISH’, RosannaPansino speaks out for the first time about unfairly being EDITED OUT of Beast’s $1,000,000 Influencer Tournament–and why it’s been so hard to watch his content ever since. Plus, Ro reveals the scary truth about her experience competing on the reality TV show ‘Scream Queens’ on VH1. And the Nerdy Nummies mogul opens up about expanding her empire even further. item.title: Trisha's Viral NPC TikTok & Ariana Grande Drama | Just Trish
item.description: Podcast Description It’s the beginning of a new era! On the premiere episode of ‘JUST TRISH’, Trisha reacts to going viral and being interviewed after taking part in the TikTok NPC trend. Plus, Trish reveals why Kourtney Kardashian gave her a panic attack, and shares her hot take on Ariana Grande’s divorce drama. Have you ever wondered how a podcast is named, or why your favorite celebrities break up? This episode of Just Trish will ease your curiosity.
